Trade/Device Name(s): Nova Max Mini Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitor System
Nova Max Mini Blood Glucose Test Strips
Nova Max Mini Ketone Test Strips
Nova Max Mini Glucose/Ketone Control Solutions
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Nova Max Mini Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitor
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Nova Max Mini Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitor System for quantitative measurement of glucose and β-hydroxybutyrate in capillary whole blood for diabetes self-management.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for single-patient home use by individuals with diabetes mellitus for quantitative measurement of glucose or β-hydroxybutyrate in fresh capillary whole blood; not intended for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
